wikipedia_page.main: Hywel Stoddart (born 1 April 1986) is a Welsh rugby union player. He is the brother of former Wales international rugby union player Morgan Stoddart. A flanker, Hywel Stoddart Llandovery, Tonmawr and Newport RFC. He made his debut for the Welsh regional team Newport Gwent Dragons 15 March 2012 versus Cardiff Blues as a second-half replacement. He was released by Newport Gwent Dragons at the end of the 2012-13 season.

response: His brother Hywel Stoddart is also a professional rugby union player.
